main event: On 13 June 1957, a bright, circular object was observed in Amarillo, Texas for 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round, white, and shining., The observation was detailed in a Project 10073 record card., Witnesses included a 27-year-old housewife and a 13-year-old boy., The weather was clear at the time of the observation., The object was initially reported as stationary but was noted to possibly move up and down.
